transcript.text: Shalom this is Daniel John Lee with tor
restoration ministries I wanted to have
the background of the beautiful fiery
red and oranges of the fall season as we
just concluded the season of psycho but
I just wanted to post another video
something that the Ruach moved on my
heart as I was at work today and I
wanted to make it as soon as possible
after I got off work when that is in
regards to Pastor Rick and elder Dale
and Cornerstone Baptist
I am totally willing to sit down with
Pastor Rick with elder Dale and talk to
them and and sit down for as long as it
takes to work out whatever problem or
issues that we have so that there can be
full and total reconciliation because
I've been hearing a lot of people from
corners on saying well Daniel you know
yours causing division and you don't
want unity no I want unity I just want
unity based off truth and love and so
again I am totally willing to sit down
with Pastor Rick with elder Dale with
anyone else at Cornerstone to try to
work out these issues so that there can
be full reconciliation my concern is is
that Rick and Dale and Cornerstone
aren't really interested in that there
they have another agenda but but I would
love it I think it would be amazing and
wonderful because yeah put a love in me
for that cornerstone congregation more
than I mean I I love that connotation
more than I've ever loved any
congregation I've ever attended and I
can't even explain it
but it's just an overwhelming love for
the pastor for elder Dale and for the
people there and you know that they
haven't treated me the best in you know
throwing me off the property and whatnot
for me just obeying the holy spirit but
again I just want to make it a very
public proclamation that you know Pastor
Rick elder Dale cornerstone if any of
you watching this I'm totally willing to
sit down and work this out so that there
can be full reconciliation so no one can
say I'm trying to bring division or
wrong division the only thing I'm doing
is you know Yahshua did said he did not
come to bring peace but a sword so I'm
bringing the truth of his sword but I'm
totally willing to seek the unity that
should be
the bond of perfection amongst the true
Saints those who truly love Yahshua who
truly love yah with all the heart soul
mind and strength and love their
neighbor as himself so hallelujah this
is Daniel John Lee with tor restoration
ministries website is spirit and tore
calm Shalom
